alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 17 at 4:37AM EDT until October 18 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Very dense, wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches are possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph at times. * WHERE...Alger, Delta, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From this evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Heavy, wet snowfall combined with strong winds and lingering fall foliage could result in tree damage and widespread power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Since this is the first winter storm of the season, extra caution is urged for those who must travel.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Delta; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
